title: Courtyard View *, Courtyard, Pet Friendly, Refrigerator
posting_body: Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 685 Sq.
Along the shores of Silver Lake, BluWater combines the tranquility of a lakeside retreat with all the conveniences of a modern, contemporary community.
We offer stunning one, two and three bedroom apartment homes on spacious grounds.
Our homes are equipped with a fireplace, garbage disposal, patio or balcony, dishwasher, washer and dryer, outside storage, free wi-fi in our lounge, fitness center and pool area.
Please contact us for more information.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
